Passenger::Application::Session

Passenger::Application::Session Class Reference

#include <Application.h>

Inherited by Passenger::Application::StandardSession, and Passenger::ApplicationPoolServer::RemoteSession.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Represents the life time of a single request/response pair.

A Session object can be used to send request data and to receive response data. A usage example is shown in Application::connect().

A session is said to be closed when the Session object is destroyed.
